title: GoPro VR: Land, Air and Sea
description:
Come along as three GoPro Heroes take you on an interactive GoPro Spherical Experience! 

To move the video a full 360 degrees, simply move your mouse or the ASWD keys.

Shot 100% on the HERO3+® camera

asset.title: GoPro VR: Land, Air and Sea
asset.description:
Come along as three GoPro Heroes take you on an interactive GoPro Spherical Experience! 

Whether exploring Land, Air and Sea, for the best VR experience use Chrome or the Kolor app available here: http://Kolor.com.
To move the video a full 360 degrees, simply move your mouse or the ASWD keys.

For best mobile experience head to http://gopro.com/spherical on your mobile device.

Learn more about the GoPro and Kolor relationship here: http://gopro.com/news.

Shot 100% on the HERO3+® camera from ‪http://GoPro.com.

Stitched 100% on Kolor from http://Kolor.com.

Get stoked and subscribe: http://goo.gl/HgVXpQ
asset.author: GoPro

transcripts: Flying is so cool, Yeah man. Alright [Inaudible] alright see you guys down there, see you down there. Wow that is awesome.
